amendment.description: Amendment sought to exclude from the regulatory rulemaking moratorium those safety regulations relating to aircraft safety, mine safety, and nuclear waste disposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 38 in the Congressional Record of February 22, 1995) to exclude from the regulatory rulemaking moratorium those safety regulations relating to aircraft safety, mine safety, and nuclear waste disposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wise amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 228 (Roll no. 168).
